name: admin
description: Admin overview for mail, skills, and wallet monitoring.

fields.label: Mail poll interval (minutes)
fields.help: How often to poll mail for every character.

fields.label: Mail history retention (days)
fields.help: How long mail data is stored in history.

fields.label: Mail max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of mail entries stored per character.

fields.label: Skills poll interval (minutes)
fields.help: How often to poll skills for every character.

fields.label: Skills history retention (days)
fields.help: How long skill snapshots are stored in history.

fields.label: Skills max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of skill snapshots stored per character.

fields.label: Training queue poll interval (minutes)
fields.help: How often to poll training queue data for every character.

fields.label: Training queue history retention (days)
fields.help: How long training queue history is stored.

fields.label: Training queue max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of training queue entries stored per character.

fields.label: Wallet poll interval (minutes)
fields.help: How often to poll wallet snapshots for every character.

fields.label: ISK history window (days)
fields.help: How long ISK history summaries are stored.

fields.label: ISK history max data points
fields.help: Caps the number of wallet history points stored per character.
